name: Sin Story
description:
─── INTRODUCTION ───

You died and got sent to Hell. The Devil cut you a deal though. If you can handle whose souls they can harvest, and whose are to go through, they'll let you go. But if you make just 3 mistakes, you'll stay there forever.

To be allowed to harvest a soul, it must have committed at least 10 points worth of sins. You can check the life story the soul wants to tell you, and compare with the souls' true thoughts, to find any discrepancies, and see which sins it actually committed.

─── NOTICE ───

The game was made with the following controller in mind. It is possible to play it using a keyboard, but the experience might not be optimal.

This game is also a Jam build. Some things are unfinished, such as the lack of SFX and music. These things may be implemented if the project is further developed.

─── KEYBOARD CONTROLS ───

S - Sins
L - (Life) Story
T - Truth?
H - Harvest
F - Free/Let go
esc/P - Pause

─── CREDITS ───

Made by DeadPie during the AAU Fall Jam 2022
